name: Grand Duchy of Luxembourg
startIntroPart2: You, glorious Prime Minister Bettel, are the leader of the Grand Duchy, the mighty Luxembourg.  After rising to power, you must now lead your nation to prosperity!
declaringWar: You have crossed Luxembourg one too many times. Now, prepare to be destroyed like the you have. never seen before
attacked: Your army fighting my army is like bringing a knife to a gunfight. After we win the war, you will be exiled, and forced to live away from any civilization, as an outcast.
defeated: We may have fallen, but the Duchy will still crush you.
introduction: Hello. I am Prime Minister Bettel, of Luxembourg.  I welcome you to the my land.
hateNo: We are not agreeing to that!
afterPeace: Very well, all that fighting was getting boring anyway.
tradeRequest: We bestow you the honor of this trade offer.
